name: Dominya Void
description:
Dominya Void is a fast paced real time strategy game! Claim stations and command the units to defeat the enemy!

Trailer:

- Each Station in the War Zone can build many types of units. Choose one that fits your strategy! They can be changed at any time. 

- The strategy can be refined with upgrades

- There is no resources management! Focus on macro decisions and quick action combat!

This is the demo build containing 3 levels and a tutorial.

Languages | Idiomas: English, Português Brasileiro, Espanõl
